mapper.select: select u.nickname, u.headimgurl, IFNULL(a.totalAmount,0) as donateTotal, IFNULL(b.num,0) as donateNum, IFNULL(c.days,0) as donateDays from cu.cu_donate_order t left join portal.userinfo u on u.openid = t.openId left join (SELECT t.openId, SUM(t.donateAmount) as totalAmount FROM `cu_donate_order` t where t.`status`='2' GROUP by t.openId ) a on a.openId = t.openid left JOIN (SELECT t.openId, count(t.openId) as num FROM `cu_donate_order` t where t.`status`='2' GROUP by t.openId ) b on b.openId = t.openid left join (select a.openId, count(a.openId) as days from ( SELECT DISTINCT t.openId, SUBSTR(t.donateDate,1 ,10) as dayTime FROM `cu_donate_order` t where t.`status`='2' )a GROUP BY a.openId) c on c.openId = t.openid where t.id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT case when o.anonymity = '0' then ( SELECT u.headimgurl FROM portal.userinfo u WHERE u.openId = o.openId ) else '' END AS avatarUrl, o.remark FROM cu.cu_donate_order o WHERE o.projectId= #{projectId} AND o.status=2 and o.remark is not null and o.remark != ''
order by o.createDate desc LIMIT 0,50
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cu_donate_order WHERE dayDonatePoint = 1 AND status = 2 AND TO_DAYS(donateDate) = TO_DAYS(now()) AND projectId = #{projectId} AND userId = #{userId}
SELECT o.donateDate , o.donateAmount , o.points , o.dayDonatePoint FROM cu.cu_donate_order o WHERE status=2 AND projectId = #{projectId} AND openId = #{openId}

SELECT IFNULL(a.dayAmount,0) AS dayAmount, IFNULL(b.totalAmount,0) AS totalAmount FROM (SELECT SUM(donateAmount) AS dayAmount , projectId FROM cu_donate_order WHERE status = 2 AND projectId = #{projectId} AND TO_DAYS(donateDate) = TO_DAYS(now())) a, (SELECT SUM(donateAmount) AS totalAmount , projectId FROM cu_donate_order WHERE status = 2 AND projectId = #{projectId}) b

SELECT * FROM (SELECT (SELECT u.nickname FROM portal.wx_user u WHERE u.openId = o.openId) AS nickname, (SELECT u.avatarUrl FROM portal.wx_user u WHERE u.openId = o.openId) AS avatarUrl, FLOOR(SUM(donateAmount)/10) AS totalPoints, (SELECT u.openId FROM portal.wx_user u WHERE u.openId = o.openId) AS openId FROM cu_donate_order o WHERE status = 2 AND projectId = #{projectId} GROUP BY userId ORDER BY totalPoints DESC) t WHERE t.totalPoints != 0 LIMIT 0,100
